meta.title: UnMarkLM — Remove NotebookLM Watermarks
meta.description: Free online tool to remove NotebookLM watermarks from infographics, slide decks, and PDFs. 100% client-side, no uploads.
hero.title: Remove NotebookLM Watermarks
hero.subtitle: Clean your infographics, slide decks, and PDFs instantly. 100% free, 100% private — your files never leave your device.
demo.title: See it in action
demo.subtitle: Drag the slider to compare the original image with the watermark removed.
dropzone.title: Drop your files here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse
processing.title: Processing...
preview.method.smartfill.desc: Reconstructs the area using surrounding pixels. Best for solid/gradient backgrounds.
preview.method.crop.desc: Fills the watermark area with the matching background color. Clean and predictable.
features.title: Why UnMarkLM?
features.privacy.title: 100% Private
features.privacy.desc: All processing happens in your browser. Your files are never uploaded to any server.
features.free.title: Completely Free
features.free.desc: No hidden fees, no credits, no subscriptions. Open source and free forever.
features.smart.title: Smart Removal
features.smart.desc: Automatically reconstructs pixels to hide the NotebookLM watermark.
features.formats.title: Multiple Formats
features.formats.desc: Supports PDF slide decks, PNG infographics, and JPG images from NotebookLM.
disclaimer: UnMarkLM is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or associated with Google LLC or NotebookLM.
disclaimer.user: Users are responsible for ensuring their use complies with applicable terms of service and laws.
error.unsupported: Unsupported file format. Please upload a PDF, PNG, or JPG file.
error.tooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 50MB.
error.processing: An error occurred while processing your file. Please try again.
error.noWatermark: No watermark detected. The file may already be clean.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: UnMarkLM supports PDF files (slide decks), PNG images (infographics), and JPG/JPEG images from NotebookLM.
faq.q2: Are my files uploaded to a server?
faq.a2: No. All processing happens entirely in your browser using JavaScript. Your files never leave your device. You can verify this by checking the Network tab in your browser's developer tools.
faq.a3: Yes, completely free with no limits. UnMarkLM is open source software.
faq.q4: How does the watermark removal work?
faq.a4: UnMarkLM detects the NotebookLM watermark (typically bottom-right) and reconstructs the pixels underneath to hide it.
faq.a5: It only adjusts a small area near the watermark, and you can preview the result before downloading.
faq.a6: Yes. UnMarkLM is fully responsive and works on smartphones and tablets.
faq.a7: No. UnMarkLM is an independent open source project and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or associated with Google LLC or NotebookLM in any way.
faq.q8: Can I use it for non-NotebookLM files?
faq.a8: The tool is optimized for NotebookLM watermarks, but the manual selection feature allows you to select any rectangular area on any image for removal.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro.title: Introduction
privacy.intro.text: Welcome to UnMarkLM. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how our tool handles your data.
privacy.local.title: Local Processing
privacy.local.text: UnMarkLM operates as a 100% client-side tool. All file processing happens locally within your web browser. Your files are NEVER uploaded to our servers or any third-party servers. Your data stays on your device at all times.
privacy.collect.title: Information We Collect
privacy.collect.text: We do not collect, store, or process any personal data or file content. We may use anonymous analytics (page visits) to improve the tool. No file data is ever transmitted.
privacy.cookies.title: Cookies & Local Storage
privacy.cookies.text: We use browser local storage to save your preferences (theme and language). We do not use tracking cookies.
privacy.contact.title: Contact
privacy.contact.text: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our Contact page.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
terms.acceptance.text: By using UnMarkLM, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use this tool.
terms.service.title: Description of Service
terms.service.text: UnMarkLM is a free, open source, client-side tool that removes visible watermarks from NotebookLM-generated content. All processing occurs in your browser.
terms.responsibility.title: User Responsibility
terms.responsibility.text: You are solely responsible for ensuring that your use of this tool complies with applicable laws and the terms of service of the platforms that generated your content. UnMarkLM does not encourage or endorse the violation of any third-party terms of service.
terms.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
terms.disclaimer.text: UnMarkLM is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not affiliated with Google LLC or NotebookLM. We are not responsible for any consequences arising from your use of this tool.
terms.ip.title: Intellectual Property
terms.ip.text: The content you process through UnMarkLM remains yours. We do not claim any rights to your files or the output generated.
terms.changes.title: Changes to Terms
terms.changes.text: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the tool after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions, feedback, or issues? We'd love to hear from you.

contact.subject: Subject
